<p>These should all get escaped:</p>
<p>Backslash: \</p>
<p>Backtick: `</p>
<p>Asterisk: *</p>
<p>Underscore: _</p>
<p>Left brace: {</p>
<p>Right brace: }</p>
<p>Left bracket: [</p>
<p>Right bracket: ]</p>
<p>Left paren: (</p>
<p>Right paren: )</p>
<p>Greater-than: ></p>
<p>Hash: #</p>
<p>Period: .</p>
<p>Bang: !</p>
<p>Plus: +</p>
<p>Minus: -</p>
<p><strong>GFM:</strong></p>
<p>Pipe: |</p>
<p>Tilde: ~</p>
<p><strong>Commonmark:</strong></p>
<p>Quote: "</p>
<p>Dollar: $</p>
<p>Percentage: %</p>
<p>Ampersand: &#x26;</p>
<p>Single quote: '</p>
<p>Comma: ,</p>
<p>Forward slash: /</p>
<p>Colon: :</p>
<p>Semicolon: ;</p>
<p>Less-than: &#x3C;</p>
<p>Equals: =</p>
<p>Question mark: ?</p>
<p>At-sign: @</p>
<p>Caret: ^</p>
<p>New line: <br>
only works in paragraphs.</p>
<p>Two spaces:<br>
only works in paragraphs.</p>
